root.name: Zaboodles!
root.description:
Zaboodles is a comical fast paced arcade style game packaged into a beautiful presentation. Jump around frantically dodging incoming zaboodles while utilizing various power-ups to stay alive and rack-up points! Although simple in nature, Zaboodles contains great depth in both its strategies and content. Throughout the game, players will fight three different bosses and unlock feats by doing fun challenges rather than passing arbitrary checkpoints. The game even has a screenshot system to capture these feats for the player to view and keep. Attain over 20 achievements, fight boss battles, and set high scores!
Available free at: zaboodles.com
